title: Pu`ukoholƒÅ Heiau National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations        Photography/Filming Permit  Anyone interested in using the Park for commercial photography/filming must obtain a special use permit. Fees are as follows: $100 Application Fee;$150 Location Fee;$50/hour Ranger Fee. For more information, please contact the Park at (808) 882-7218.  Special Use Permits  Contact the Chief Ranger for more information on special use permits at (808) 882-7218.
